attributes.action: Debate a motion of no confidence in the Tory government.
attributes.additional_details: They think we haven't noticed that they don't listen, they just spout the party line and ignore expert advice from doctors, teachers and other public sector workers who do jobs that none of them could do, work with people whose circumstances none of them can imagine and who are fed up with being degraded and devalued. Add to that the derogatory attitude towards those who are less fortunate than themselves: refugees, the disabled, the long-term sick, and everyone else. It's time we did something
attributes.background: Everyday, my facebook feed is filled with smart, passionate people who have dedicated their lives to working for public services, such as health and education, enraged by the callous, arrogant bullying attitude of the current Conservative Government. We are sick of being dictated to

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121623
